name: Paris, France
description: The city of lights and love, global hub for culture, fashion, and art.

details.long_description: Paris, the capital of France, it is known for its iconic Eiffel Tower, and world-class museums like the Louvre, and charming cafés. Explore the history
itinerary: Day 1: Visit the Eiffel Tower, and explore the Seine River.
Day 2: Discover the Louvre Museum and stroll through the Champs-Elysees.
Day 3: Visit Montmartre, Sacré-Cæur Basilica, and enjoy a Seine river cruise.

name: Geneva, Switzerland
description: Explore the city that is known for its stunning natural beauty and home for many international organizations.

details.long_description: Geneva, known for its scenic locations, outdoor activities, and an international hub
itinerary: Day 1: Visit lake Geneva and walk through the Old Town.
Day 2: Visit the St. Pierre Cathedral and go to Choco Pass to taste test varities of chocolates.
Day 3: Visit the Jet d'Eau water fountain and later explore the birthplace of watchmaking.

name: Osaka, Japan
description: Explore the vibrant, bustling city infused with culture and history.

details.long_description: Osaka, known for its modern architecture, nightlife, and hearty street food
itinerary: Day 1: Visit Osaka Castle and end the night by going to the downtown Minami.
Day 2: Have fun time at the Universal Studio.
Day 3: Explore Kuromon market and Tenjin Matsuri for some fireworks.

name: Sydney, Australia
description: Explore the city that is around beautiful bays in the world with sparkling beaches.

details.long_description: Sydney, known for its harbourfront Opera House, circular quay port, and royal botanic garden
itinerary: Day 1: Explore the Sydney Opera House, and climb the Harbour Bridge to view the city.
Day 2: Explore the charm of the Blue Mountains.
Day 3: Visit the Taronga Zoo and ride the ferry to Manly.

name: Kerala, India
description: God's Own Country, diverse in landscapes and rich cultural heritage.

details.long_description: Kerala, known for its plam-lined beaches and backwaters, mountain slopes of tea, coffee and spice plantations and wildlife
itinerary: Day 1: Go on the houseboat and experience the authentic Keralite cuisines.
Day 2: Visit Eravikulam national park, and visit the tea plantations.
Day 3: Visit the Marari beach and taste the nearby local cusines.

name: Cape Town, South Africa
description: A city that is known as the Mother City, filled with mountains and seas

details.long_description: Known for its breathtaking natural landscapes, home of economic and cultural hub, and a mix of multiple culture influences
itinerary: Day 1: Experience the table mountain aerial cableway .
Day 2: Visit Kirstenbosch National Botanical Garden and enjoy your rest of the day at Bloubergstrand beach.
Day 3: Visit District Six Museum and Castle of Good Hope.
